messages.subject: Re: Odagiri Jo in Shinobi
messages.msgSnippet: Looks like he s gonna be the lead in this upcoming movie. http://www.shinobi-movie.com/index2.html Looks very interesting. For those of you who have watched
messages.messageBody:
Looks like he's gonna be the lead in this upcoming movie.

http://www.shinobi-movie.com/index2.html

Looks very interesting. For those of you who have watched the anime Basilisk, this movie looks like pretty much be a live action version of that.

~Okita

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
